item.title: 阿里尼的Lemssouguer指出，仅凭对人工智能的恐惧就可能导致软件违约风险
item.description: 阿里尼资本管理公司创始人哈姆扎·勒姆苏盖指出，对人工智能可能引发颠覆性变革的担忧，已足以推高软件企业的融资成本，给这个负债累累的行业带来困境。【原文：Fear of AI’s potential for disruption is enough to push up borrowing costs for software companies, causing problems for a sector that has a lot of debt, according to Arini Capital Management’s founder Hamza Lemssouguer.】

item.title: 非盟银行考虑推出工具，为非洲项目解锁高达4万亿美元资金
item.description: 非洲开发银行正在制定新的风险评估框架，该框架将有助于其为投资释放更多资本。【原文：The African Development Bank is working on a new risk-assessment framework that will help it unlock more capital for investments.】

item.title: 据称Sify Infinit在印度IPO中寻求42亿美元估值
item.description: 据知情人士透露，印度数据中心公司Sify Infinit Spaces Ltd.计划下月进行首次公开募股（IPO），目标估值高达42亿美元。【原文：Indian data-center company Sify Infinit Spaces Ltd. is seeking a valuation of as much as $4.2 billion in a potential initial public offering next month, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 俄罗斯转向更大油轮，因其更多石油输往中国
item.description: 俄罗斯正调整其石油供应链，以应对运往中国的原油数量激增。部分油品正从小型油轮转运至大型油轮，在新的海上中转站完成装载，以应对更长的东向航程。【原文：Russia is changing its oil supply chain to cope with the growing number of barrels going to China, shifting some shipments from smaller to larger tankers at a new at-sea site for the longer voyage east.】

item.title: 债券交易恶化或将动摇北欧信贷繁荣
item.description: 一系列北欧债券交易在发行后接连暴跌，令长期投资者对这个迅速膨胀的市场声誉忧心忡忡。【原文：A succession of Nordic bond deals that sank after issuance is leading long term investors to fret about the reputation of this rapidly burgeoning market.】

item.title: Shein承诺升级中国供应链以争取北京支持
item.description: Shein计划投资逾100亿元人民币（约合14.5亿美元）强化其在华南地区的供应链体系。这家快时尚电商平台正寻求加强与北京的联系，以应对香港首次公开募股受阻及日益增大的外部压力。【原文：Shein plans to invest over 10 billion yuan ($1.45 billion) to strengthen its supply chain in Southern China, as the fast‑fashion online retailer seeks to reinforce ties with Beijing amid a stalled Hong Kong initial public offering and mounting external pressures.】

item.title: 肯尼亚在关键时刻成功购得乌干达输油管道股权
item.description: 乌干达将通过首次公开募股持有肯尼亚石油产品管道五分之一的股权，部分分析师认为该股定价过高。【原文：Uganda will own a fifth of Kenya’s oil-products pipeline through an initial public offering that some analysts have said was overpriced.】

item.title: SpaceX巨额IPO重塑2026年上市候选企业路线图
item.description: 亿万富翁埃隆·马斯克计划为SpaceX进行史上最大规模的首次公开募股，这对现有投资者和银行而言无疑是重大利好——他们将从中获得天文数字般的费用。【原文：Billionaire Elon Musk planning the largest initial public offering of all time for SpaceX is great news for existing backers and banks that would reap astronomical fees.】

item.title: 据称贝恩资本与Lone Star正瞄准三菱电机的汽车业务部门
item.description: 据知情人士透露，贝恩资本和孤星基金已进入三菱电机汽车设备业务的第二轮竞标。【原文：Bain Capital and Lone Star Funds have advanced to a second round of bidding for Mitsubishi Electric Corp.’s automotive equipment business, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 市政债券市场趋稳后将重拾升势，贝莱德首席执行官如是说
item.description: 贝莱德公司市政债券部门主管帕特·哈斯克尔表示，随着市场环境趋稳，市政债券在2025年表现逊于美国国债后，今年有望迎来强劲表现。【原文：Municipal bonds are poised for a solid year after lagging US Treasuries in 2025 as market conditions stabilize, according to Pat Haskell, head of the municipal bond group at BlackRock Inc.】

item.title: 贝莱德认为欧洲信用利差在人工智能担忧中保持稳定
item.description: 贝莱德公司预计，今年欧洲信用利差将维持区间波动，因具有吸引力的固定收益收益率可能抵消市场对人工智能潜在冲击的担忧。【原文：BlackRock Inc. sees European credit spreads staying range-bound this year as attractive fixed-income yields are likely to offset worries around the potential disruption from artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 印尼主权财富基金联席首席投资官辞职，领导层空缺扩大
item.description: 据知情人士透露，印尼投资局联席首席投资官安德里·塞蒂亚万已辞职，加剧了该国首个主权财富基金的领导层空缺，并引发对其未来方向的质疑。【原文：Indonesia Investment Authority’s Co-Chief Investment Officer Andry Setiawan has resigned, deepening a leadership vacuum at the country’s first sovereign wealth fund and raising questions about its future direction, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 若被纳入摩根大通债券指数，菲律宾或获30亿美元资金流入
item.description: 菲律宾国家财务部长莎伦·阿尔曼萨表示，若该国政府债券今年被纳入摩根大通新兴市场基准指数，菲律宾可能迎来约30亿美元的资金流入。【原文：The Philippines may see inflows of about $3 billion if the nation’s government bonds are added to JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s benchmark emerging-market index this year, according to National Treasurer Sharon Almanza.】

item.title: 日元延续跌势，因报道称高市早苗主张加息
item.description: 周二，日元延续跌势，此前日本媒体报道称，日本首相高市早苗上周与日本央行行长植田和男会晤时，对进一步加息表示担忧。【原文：The yen extended declines on Tuesday after local media reported that Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi voiced apprehension over more rate hikes in a meeting with Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda last week.】

item.title: 洛杉矶港务局长预见法院裁决后货运量可能激增
item.description: 洛杉矶港执行董事尤金·塞罗卡表示，美国最高法院对特朗普总统全面加征关税的裁决可能推动货运量增长。【原文：The US Supreme Court’s decision on President Donald Trump’s sweeping tariffs may drive up cargo volume, Port of Los Angeles Executive Director Eugene Seroka said.】

item.title: 日本钢铁将发行35亿美元可转换债券
item.description: 日本钢铁公司计划在海外市场发行5500亿日元（约合35亿美元）的可转换债券，以筹集资金用于偿还收购美国钢铁公司时所借的贷款。【原文：Nippon Steel Corp. intends to sell 550 billion yen ($3.5 billion) of convertible bonds in overseas markets, in order to raise funds to help repay loans taken out for its acquisition of United States Steel Corp.】

item.title: 香港银行试图出售其以大幅折扣购入的豪宅
item.description: 去年未能以大幅折扣售出查封豪宅的香港某银行，正趁奢侈房地产市场回暖之际再次尝试出售。【原文：A Hong Kong bank that failed to sell a seized mansion at a steep discount last year is trying again as the luxury real estate market swings back to life.】

item.title: 受人工智能和关税担忧影响股市暴跌后将趋稳
西班牙电信业绩因西班牙和巴西市场增长而提升
item.description: 西班牙电信公司公布的第四季度财报符合分析师预期，因西班牙和巴西市场的增长抵消了其他欧洲市场的疲软表现。【原文：Telefónica SA posted fourth-quarter earnings that met analyst estimates as growth in Spain and Brazil offset weakness in other European markets.】

item.title: 西特里尼的反乌托邦预言助推亚洲摆脱全球人工智能阴霾
item.description: Citrini Research描绘的人工智能塑造的反乌托邦未来愿景，正强化市场对亚洲将成为人工智能颠覆性变革中赢家这一预判。这得益于亚洲拥有众多芯片制造商等企业，而美国部分市场正遭受剧烈震荡。【原文：Citrini Research’s vision of a dystopian future shaped by artificial intelligence is reinforcing bets that Asia will emerge as a winner of the AI disruption, thanks to its wealth of companies like chipmakers, in contrast to the turmoil hitting parts of the US market.】

item.title: 据称，香港稳定币支付公司RedotPay正考虑进行10亿美元的美国IPO。
item.description: 据知情人士透露，总部位于香港的稳定币支付公司RedotPay正考虑在美国进行首次公开募股，潜在融资额可能超过10亿美元。【原文：RedotPay, a stablecoin payments company based in Hong Kong, is considering an initial public offering in the US to potentially raise over $1 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 伍德赛德称液化天然气供应过剩或压低价格 但需求依然强劲
item.description: 澳大利亚最大液化天然气生产商表示，尽管全球液化天然气供应过剩的预期可能压低价格，但需求增长强劲，且新增供应尚不确定。【原文：A forecast global glut of liquefied natural gas may weigh on prices, but demand growth is strong and supply additions aren’t certain, according to Australia’s biggest LNG producer.】

item.title: 法航雅高因未达气候目标将支付债券罚金
item.description: 法荷航集团与酒店集团雅高公司因未能达成温室气体减排目标，将需向债券持有人支付罚金。【原文：Air France-KLM and hotelier Accor SA will need to cough up financial penalties to bondholders because they failed to meet greenhouse gas targets.】

item.title: 避开日本，中国游客助推泰国旅游业复苏
item.description: 中国游客目前约占泰国每周入境游客总数的四分之一，这凸显了该国最重要的旅游市场正在回归。【原文：Chinese travelers now account for roughly a quarter of Thailand’s weekly arrivals, underscoring the return of the country’s most important tourism market.】

item.title: 比特币正走向自2022年6月加密货币崩盘以来最糟糕的月份
item.description: 比特币周二延续跌势，该加密货币正朝着自2022年行业遭遇企业倒闭潮以来最剧烈的月度跌幅迈进。【原文：Bitcoin extended its decline on Tuesday, putting the token on course for its steepest monthly drop since the industry suffered a slew of corporate collapses in 2022.】

item.title: 特朗普10%关税生效，美国重建关税壁垒
item.description: 特朗普政府周二实施了新的10%全球关税，此举标志着白宫为维护总统贸易议程而展开的行动正式启动——此前最高法院已否决了其最初的全面关税计划。【原文：Donald Trump’s new 10% global tariffs went into effect on Tuesday, kicking off a White House effort to preserve the president’s trade agenda after the Supreme Court struck down his original sweeping duties.】

item.title: 南非交易员对兰特汇率持三年内最强看跌态度
item.description: 南非兰特看跌期权押注量升至近三年高位，交易员开始质疑该国货币的急剧升值是否还能持续。【原文：Bearish options bets on the rand are at the highest in almost three years as traders start to question whether the South African currency’s headlong rally has further to run.】

item.title: 印度IT股抛售加剧，因Citrini报告引发人工智能恐慌
item.description: 印度软件服务类股的暴跌态势加剧，此前Citrini Research发布的一份报告加剧了市场对易受人工智能日益增长的影响所冲击的企业前景的担忧。【原文：A rout in Indian software services stocks deepened after a report from Citrini Research amplified worries about businesses that are vulnerable to the growing influence of artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 中国钢铁产量数据遭质疑，分析师指出产出缺口
item.description: 中国钢铁产量正受到密切关注，部分分析师质疑去年产量是否如官方数据所示大幅下滑，这种差异可能颠覆外界对中国对铁矿石及其他原料需求的预期。【原文：Chinese steel output is drawing scrutiny as some analysts question whether it fell last year as sharply as official figures show, highlighting a discrepancy that could upend views on the country’s appetite for iron ore and other feedstocks.】

item.title: 高盛和花旗认为南非正等待出台债务规则
item.description: 据彭博社调查显示，南非财政部长本周在预算案中不太可能正式采用财政锚机制，而是选择至少等到10月再推出这项旨在遏制公共债务的规则。【原文：South Africa’s finance minister is unlikely to formally adopt a fiscal anchor in this week’s budget, opting to wait until at least October to introduce the rule aimed at curbing public debt, according to a Bloomberg poll.】
